verbs.description: This week US President Donald Trump [V: will] finally come face to face with a leader who is virtually half his age , who inherited his position from his father and grandfather , and who is venerated by the millions of North Koreans who labor to keep his regime fed and in power .

This week US President Donald Trump will finally come [ARGM-MNR: face] to [V: face] with a leader who is virtually half his age , who inherited his position from his father and grandfather , and who is venerated by the millions of North Koreans who labor to keep his regime fed and in power .
